Title: Adventuring in Khaz Algar
Description:
We've got scouts in every corner o' Khaz Algar, an' they all report the same thing: trouble.

Seems we got here just in time, eh?

Check the scouting map on the table behind ye and lend a hand where ye can.
ObjectivesText: Review the Scouting Map to choose an area within Khaz Algar to support.
RewardText: <Your decision has been made. You can return to the scouting map at any time to choose another location.>
